channel.title: Firefox crashing
channel.description: im using firefox 2 and when im surfing the web it keeps crashing. there are no particular websites it crashes on. it comes up with an error report and asks me to send it. then it comes up with a feedback thing where it asks the site and stuff. it was really getting to me so i had to start using internet explorer :mad: but that kept on crashing too. i just closed its self without waring at and random time. so using the internet is a bit of an annoyance. anyone know how to fix the problem?

juju:

Opera is your only choice.

im not sure if it is becos of the browser because it crashes on internet explorer too.

im using firefox 2 and when im surfing the web it keeps crashing. there are no particular websites it crashes on. it comes up with an error report and asks me to send it. then it comes up with a feedback thing where it asks the site and stuff. it was really getting to me so i had to start using internet explorer :mad: but that kept on crashing too. i just closed its self without waring at and random time. so using the internet is a bit of an annoyance. anyone know how to fix the problem?
[/quote]

Debug errors? I get them once in a while…is that it?[/quote]

debug errors? no i dont think thats it
